table_caption: Table lists connection-level results for the clusters of VN/SN–auditory connections that were negatively associated with 2b-T accuracy and positively associated with attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD)-symptom severity (combined, inattentiveness and impulsivity). One-sample t-values, indicate that the correlation was significantly (p < 0.05, uncorrected, two-tailed) different from zero. Pearson’s correlation coefficient (r) indicates the strength of the relationship with the behavioral variable for each ROI-to-ROI connection.
